languages.text: {n}Покосившись на Паскаля, Идира не без едкости в голосе замечает:{/n} "Похоже, не только Адептус Механикус имеют право разбираться в науках? Это не ущемляет авторитет почтенного магоса?"
{n}Slanting a look at Pasqal, Idira remarks lightly:{/n} "Looks like the sciences aren't only the preserve of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Doesn't that infringe on the authority of the esteemed Magos?"
languages.original_text: {n}Покосившись на Паскаля, Идира не без едкости в голосе замечает:{/n} "Похоже, не только Адептус Механикус имеют право разбираться в науках? Это не ущемляет авторитет почтенного магоса?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Slanting a look at Pasqal, Idira remarks lightly:{/n} "Looks like the sciences aren't only the preserve of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Doesn't that infringe on the authority of the esteemed Magos?"
{n}Slanting a look at Pasqal, Idira remarks lightly:{/n} "Looks like the sciences aren't only the preserve of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Doesn't that infringe on the authority of the esteemed Magos?"
{n}Slanting a look at Pasqal, Idira remarks lightly:{/n} "Looks like the sciences aren't only the preserve of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Doesn't that infringe on the authority of the esteemed Magos?"
{n}Slanting a look at Pasqal, Idira remarks lightly:{/n} "Looks like the sciences aren't only the preserve of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Doesn't that infringe on the authority of the esteemed Magos?"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉斜视着帕斯卡，轻声说了一句。{/n}“看来科学并不是机械修会的专利。如果我这么说，会不会侵犯到尊贵贤者的权威性？”
languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a look at Pasqal, Idira remarks lightly:{/n} "Looks like the sciences aren't only the preserve of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Doesn't that infringe on the authority of the esteemed Magos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉斜视着帕斯卡，轻声说了一句。{/n}“看来科学并不是机械修会的专利。如果我这么说，会不会侵犯到尊贵贤者的权威性？”

languages.text: {n}Mirando de reojo a Pasqal, Idira comenta:{/n} «Parece que las ciencias no son dominio exclusivo del Adeptus Mechanicus. ¿Esto no infringe la autoridad del estimado magos?».
languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a look at Pasqal, Idira remarks lightly:{/n} "Looks like the sciences aren't only the preserve of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Doesn't that infringe on the authority of the esteemed Magos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mirando de reojo a Pasqal, Idira comenta:{/n} «Parece que las ciencias no son dominio exclusivo del Adeptus Mechanicus. ¿Esto no infringe la autoridad del estimado magos?».

languages.text: {n}パスカルを見やり、イディラは軽口を叩く。{/n}「科学は帝国技術局だけの領分ではないようね。偉大な賢人の職分を侵してやしないかしら？」
languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a look at Pasqal, Idira remarks lightly:{/n} "Looks like the sciences aren't only the preserve of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Doesn't that infringe on the authority of the esteemed Magos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルを見やり、イディラは軽口を叩く。{/n}「科学は帝国技術局だけの領分ではないようね。偉大な賢人の職分を侵してやしないかしら？」

languages.text: {n}Mit einem Seitenblick auf Pasqal bemerkt Idira leichthin:{/n} "Anscheinend sind die Wissenschaften nicht nur die Domäne des Adeptus Mechanicus. Verletzt das nicht die Autorität des geschätzten Magos?"
languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a look at Pasqal, Idira remarks lightly:{/n} "Looks like the sciences aren't only the preserve of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Doesn't that infringe on the authority of the esteemed Magos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem Seitenblick auf Pasqal bemerkt Idira leichthin:{/n} "Anscheinend sind die Wissenschaften nicht nur die Domäne des Adeptus Mechanicus. Verletzt das nicht die Autorität des geschätzten Magos?"

languages.text: {n}Idira lance un regard en coin à Pasqal et remarque sur un ton léger :{/n} « Il faut croire que la science n'est pas l'apanage de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Ça n'empiète pas sur l'autorité de notre estimé magos ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a look at Pasqal, Idira remarks lightly:{/n} "Looks like the sciences aren't only the preserve of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Doesn't that infringe on the authority of the esteemed Magos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lance un regard en coin à Pasqal et remarque sur un ton léger :{/n} « Il faut croire que la science n'est pas l'apanage de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Ça n'empiète pas sur l'autorité de notre estimé magos ? »

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'a bir bakış atan İdira, yorumunu eksik etmiyor.{/n} "Anlaşılan ilim yapmak Adeptus Mechanicus'un tekelinde değilmiş. Bu durum, pek saygıdeğer Magos'un otoritesini sarsmıyor mu acaba?"
languages.original_text: {n}Slanting a look at Pasqal, Idira remarks lightly:{/n} "Looks like the sciences aren't only the preserve of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Doesn't that infringe on the authority of the esteemed Magos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'a bir bakış atan İdira, yorumunu eksik etmiyor.{/n} "Görünüşe göre ilim yapmak Adeptus Mechanicus'un tekelinde değilmiş. Bu, saygıdeğer Magos'un otoritesine şerh düşürmüyor mu?"
